name: The Grandmaster - Tiger Movement Set
detailed_description:
In the Tiger DLC, become a fearless fighter with earth-shattering screams that can wipe opponents off the screen. This is a fun DLC move that can make this game even more fun for you, no matter if this is your first time playing it, or your thousandth time playing it.

*This DLC is a set of fighting animations and purely cosmetic. It doesn’t give any advantages in the game whatsoever, but it is always a nice way to support us

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.0 Gghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 5 Series
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 3.0 ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 7 Series
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
